rooms.name: Apartments
rooms.description:
The apartments are pleasant and meet the needs of a modern businessman.
All rooms have windows that open.
Wireless internet is free in all rooms and public areas of the hotel.
Hotel guests can use the fitness and spa center with indoor pool and sauna free of charge.
